Withdraw Partial Borrow.Withdrawn: Cannot withdraw as you have already withdrawn
Withdraw Partial Borrow.Spent: Cannot withdraw as your loan is spent. You need to revert spend to Borrow !!

Revert Spend.Spent: Cannot revert spend as your loan is spent

Withdraw Collateral.Not Repaid: Cannot withdraw collateral as your loan is not repaid
Withdraw Collateral.Timelock: Cannot withdraw collateral as your timelock is not over. You can withdraw after
